articles.content:
If anybody doubts the value of the quarterback position, or specifically drafting the right one, they need only look to the 2020 NFL Draft.

articles.title: Giants put Ross Stripling back in the rotation - McCovey Chronicles
articles.description: The San Francisco Giants are putting Ross Stripling back in the rotation against the Philadelphia Phillies, with Sean Manaea in the bullpen.
articles.content:
Happy Wednesday, San Francisco Giants fans. It is indeed a happy Wednesday, as the Giants are going for a sweep today, after beating the Philadelphia Phillies 4-3 on Tuesday night.
